description: A shell script designed to mount and unmount USB drives, handle logging, send system events, and manage related system configuration for USB devices, used in a systemd environment.

methods.name: log_msg
methods.description: Logs a message to the configured log file, including timestamp and process ID.

methods.name: sendMountChangedEvent
methods.description: Sends a system event indicating USB mount or unmount status via IARM event sender.

methods.name: do_mount
methods.description: Mounts the specified USB device, creates necessary directories, and updates mount point state.

methods.name: do_unmount
methods.description: Unmounts the specified USB device and updates system state accordingly.
